short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust screen brightness to a protective color from the list or choose your preferred shade.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Easy Night Shift" â€“ a robust extension designed to alter the screen's colors to gentle, eye-protective tones while engaging with computer screens at night.

By simply navigating to settings page, you can select your preferred color RGB and opacity. Once your choices are established, they will seamlessly applied to all open tabs, ensuring a harmonized reading encounter throughout your entire browsing session.

Additionally, the extension offers a selection of colors that are gentle on your eyes when it's dark. You can effortlessly include a color you prefer or remove any from the list within the settings.

Remember: When you first install the extension, the Night Shift feature is turned off. You need to turn it on in the settings to use it.
